subfields.b: a reader in research and theory /

subfields.c: edited by James N. Rosenau ; Advisory Committee, Bernard C. Cohen [and others].

subfields.a: The linkage between foreign policy and international politics / Fred A. Sondermann -- International relations as an autonomous discipline / P.D. Marchant -- The social sciences, history, and international relations / Charles A. Mc Clelland -- Toward greater order in the study of international politics / Richard C. Snyder -- Various meanings of "theory" / Anatol Rapoport -- Long range research in international relations / Harold Guetzkow -- Explanation and prediction in international politics / Harold and Margaret Sprout -- Problems of choice and decision / Henry L. Roberts -- The rise and demise of the territorial state / John H. Herz -- Notes on the role of the national : a social psychological concept for the study of international relations / Stewart E. Perry -- Security communities / Karl W. Deutsch -- Environmental factors in the study of international politics / Harold and Margaret Sprout -- Order and community in the international social system / Talcott Parsons -- Social changes affecting international relations / Kingsley Davis -- The pole of power and the pole of indifference / Arnold Wolfers -- Isolation and collaboration : a partial theory of inter-nation relations / Harold Guetzkow -- The national interest and other interests / Morton A. Kaplan -- Power and ideology in international politics / Hans J. Morgenthau -- The retarded science of international strategy / Thomas C. Schelling -- The decision-making approach to the study of international politics / Richard C. Snyder, H.W. Bruck, and Burton Sapin -- The United States decision to resist aggression in Korea : the application of an analytical scheme / Richard C. Snyder and Glenn D. Paige -- Intelligence and policy-making in foreign affairs / Roger Hilsman, Jr. -- Foreign policy makers and the press / Bernard C. Cohen -- The flow of policy-making in the Department of State / Charlton Ogburn Jr. -- Strategic planning and the political process / Samuel P. Huntington -- Opinion formation and decision-making in Samoa / Felix M. Keesing and Marie M. Keesing -- Motivational analysis of foreign policy decision-making / Richard C. Snyder, H.W. Bruck, and Burton Sapin -- The power inventory and national strategy / Stephen B. Jones -- The elites and foreign policy / Gabriel A. Almond -- The policymaker and the intellectual / Henry A. Kissinger -- Political communication on the Japanese peace settlement / Bernard C. Cohen -- The non-Western political process / Lucian W. Pye -- Motivation for war / Klaus Knorr -- National character : an old problem re-examined / Arvid Brodersen -- Toward a definition of nationalism / Boyd C. Shafer -- The normative inner order of societies / F.S.C. Northrop -- The balance of power : prescription, concept, or propaganda / Ernst B. Haas -- Toward an equilibrium theory of international relations and institutions / George Liska -- An analysis of power, with special reference to international politics / Maurice A. Ash -- Balance of power, bipolarity and other models of international systems / Morton A. Kaplan -- From balance to deterrence : a theoretical analysis / Arthur Lee Burns -- The power transition / A.F.K. Organski -- Challenge and response : a tool for the analysis of international affairs / Andrew M. Scott -- Game theory and the analysis of political behavior / Richard C. Snyder -- National images and international systems / Kenneth E. Boulding -- The form of a discipline of international relations / Quincy Wright -- Applications of general systems theory in international relations / Charles A. Mc Clelland -- International relations : the long road to theory / Stanley H. Hoffmann -- Actors, ends, and means : a coarse-screen macro-theory of international relations / Urban G. Whitaker, Jr. -- Toward an inventory of basic trends and patterns in comparative and international politics / Karl W. Deutsch -- Capability, threat, and the outbreak of war / Dina A. Zinnes, Robert C. North, and Howard E. Koch, Jr. -- Studies in measurement of the relations among sovereign states / Frank L. Klingberg -- The mathematics of arms races / Anatol Rapoport -- Some observations on political gaming / Herbert Goldhamer and Hans Speier -- A simple diplomatic game / Oliver Benson.
